The fans in the stadium won't regret buying tickets for today's game as they have witnessed a great game so far, and nothing suggests it's going to change in the second half. Neither side is enjoying any significant control of the game. The tactic of the home side is slow build up play and the away side is creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks.
